div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 155px; margin-left: 141px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 108px; height: 1px; padding-top: 315px; margin-left: 122px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 282px; height: 1px; padding-top: 0px; margin-left: 5px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 130px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 9px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

p.font:
Sparse Merkle Tree
- Inclusion Proof (Merkle Tree なので)
- Keyに対して葉の位置が固定 => Key-Value Store
ZK-SMT
- 葉の位置を教えずにSMTが使える (Key に Nonce を加える)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 300px; margin-left: 252px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 9px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.div: Claim は JSON などで与える

switch.text: Claim は JSON などで与える

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 330px; margin-left: 252px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 9px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.span: Key + Nonce で葉の位置を決める
Nonce を Witness にして、Inclusion Proof を行う

switch.text: Key + Nonce で葉の位置を決める...
